block.p: Katrina Claire Cason, a daughter of Julie C. Swaner of Salt Lake City and Lamar H. Cason of Alexandria, Va., was married yesterday morning to Matthew Thomas Vernon, the son of Ann Vernon and Tom Vernon of Winston-Salem, N.C. The Rev. Ron J. Grillo, a nondenominational minister, officiated at the Brookstown Inn in Winston-Salem.

Mrs. Vernon, 25, is a library assistant at the Carolina Population Center Library of the University of North Carolina. She graduated magna cum laude from George Washington and is studying for a master's degree in library science at North Carolina.

Katrina Claire Cason, a daughter of Julie C. Swaner of Salt Lake City and Lamar H. Cason of Alexandria, Va., was married yesterday morning to Matthew Thomas Vernon, the son of Ann Vernon and Tom Vernon of Winston-Salem, N.C. The Rev. Ron J. Grillo, a nondenominational minister, officiated at the Brookstown Inn in Winston-Salem.

Mrs. Vernon, 25, is a library assistant at the Carolina Population Center Library of the University of North Carolina. She graduated magna cum laude from George Washington and is studying for a master's degree in library science at North Carolina.

Mr. Vernon, 26, is a project assistant at North Carolina Echo in Raleigh, a federally financed organization digitizing special collections at state cultural institutions for online use. He graduated magna cum laude from North Carolina State and is a master's candidate in public history there.
